text:
="preserve">Alexandria is a city in Virginia in the United States. It has a population of 159,200 in 2020. It is 6 miles south of Washington, D.C. It is by the Potomac River. The temperature is between 80°F to 100°F in the summer, and 20°F to 40°F in the winter.
The city is twinned with Caen in France, Dundee in Scotland and Gyumri in Armenia.
